member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisErrorCodes.ERR_DBEWLOCK
member.summary: Database access denied (probably exclusive write lock).

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisErrorCodes.ERR_RECEOF
member.summary: Record eof: found eof in database.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisErrorCodes.ERR_TRMEOF
member.summary: Term eof: found eof in database.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppAcTab(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the ISIS alphabetic character table used in world indexing technique 4.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppDebug(System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisDebugFlags)
member.summary: Specifies the way ISIS32.DLL handles run-time error messages.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppDelete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an ISIS Application object and frees all associated memory.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppLogFile(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the name of a log file ISIS32.DLL uses to log run-time errors.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppNew
member.summary: The IsisAppNew function creates an ISIS Application. It returns an application handle to create ISIS Spaces and displays a message-box window containing the ISIS32.DLL copyright message.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppParGet(System.Int32,System.String,System.Text.StringBuilder,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a physical file name from a logical one using file/path conversion table.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppParSet(System.Int32,System.String)
member.param: Specifies the file.par file name or a string describing the table. If it is a file name, it must be preceded by @. The especification of the extension is not required.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisAppUcTab(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Specifies the ISIS upppercase conversion table.
member.param: Specifies the isisuc.tab file name or a string describing the 256 character table. If it is a file name, it must be preceded by @. The especification of the extension is not required.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcHeaderMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisSearchHeader@)
member.summary: Copies the search header control data to an application program area.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Application.
Specifies the number (non negative integer) of the temporary search log file containing the desired search result.
Specifies the search number (non negative integer). If this parameter is zero, the last search submitted will be retrieved.
Specifies the area where the data will be retrieved.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcHitMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisSearchHit[])
member.summary: Copies a subset of search hits to an application program area.
member.param: Identifies an ISIS Application.
Specifies the number of the temporary search log file (non negative integer) containing the desired search results.
Specifies the search number (non negative integer). If this parameter is zero, the last search submitted will be retrieved.
Initial range position of retrieved directory elements (firstpos > 0).
Last range position in the list of retrieved directory elements.
Specifies the area where the data will be copied.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcLogFileFlush(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes the contents of a search log file.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcLogFileSave(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Save permanently the contents of a search log file in a given moment.
member.param: Identifies an ISIS Application.
Specifies the number (non negative integer) of the search log file used by the search algorithmn containing the desired search results.
Specifies the log file name.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcLogFileUse(System.Int32,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Assigns to a search log file the searchs previously saved by means of IsisSrcLogFileSave function.
member.param: Identifies an ISIS Application.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcMfnMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Copies a subset of mfns from a search hit list and moves it into an application program area.
member.param: Identifies an ISIS Application.
Specifies the number (non negative integer) of the temporary search log file used by the search algorithm containing the desired search results.
Specifies the search number (non negative integer). If this parameter is zero, the last search submitted will be retrieved.
Initial range position in the list of retrieved mfns (firstpos >0).
Last range position in the list of retrieved mfns.
Specifies an array of MFN where the data will be copied.
member.returns: Returns number of MFNs or error code.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisSrcSearch(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisSearchHeader@)
member.summary: Executes a search expression over an ISIS Space inverted file and copies basic data on the result to an application program area.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the number (non negative integer) of the temporary search log file to be used by the search algoritm to store search results.
Specifies the search expression using the CDS/ISIS search language.
Specifies the area where the data will be copied.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmMfnMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32[])
member.summary: Copies a subset of mfns from a term posting list and movies it into an application program area. The posting corresponds to the term stored at shelf index.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Initial range position in the list of retrieved MFNs (firstpos > 0).
Last range position in the list of retrieved MFNs.
Specifies an array of MFNs where the data will be copied.
member.returns: Returns number of MFNs or error code.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmPostingMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTermPosting[])
member.summary: Copies a subset of postings into an application program area. The postings correspond to the term stored at shelf index.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Initial range position in the list of retrieved postings elements (firstpos > 0).
Last range position int the list of retrieved postings elements.
Specifies an array of IsisTermPosting structures where the data will be copied.
member.returns: Returns number of of retrieved postings or error code.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmReadMap(System.Int32,System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTrmRead@)
member.summary: Loads an inverted file term into a shelf and returns the number of postings or an error condition.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Specifies the IsisTrmRead structure with the inverted file term to be loaded.
member.returns: Returns total number of postings or error code.
member.remarks: Unless the shelf index had not been previously allocated with zero bytes, this function loads the corresponding posting header segment. IsisTrmReadMap always converts key to uppercase.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmReadNext(System.Int32,System.Int32,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTrmRead@)
member.summary: Loads the next inverted file term and returns the number of postings or an error condition.
member.param: Identifies an ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Specifies the IsisTrmReadStructure where the next inverted file term will be copied.
member.returns: Returns total number of postings or error code.
member.remarks: Unless the shelf index had not been previously allocated with zero bytes, this function loads the corresponding posting header segment. A call to IsisTrmReadNext must be preceded by a call to IsisTrmReadMap, IsisTrmReadPrevious or another IsisTrmReadNext.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmReadPrevious(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String,ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTrmRead@)
member.summary: Loads the previous inverted file term and returns the number of postings or an error condition.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Specifies the lower limit for the previous key.
Specifies the IsisTrmRead structure where the previous inverted file term will be copied.
member.returns: Total number of postings or error code.
member.remarks: Unless the shelf index had not been previously allocated with zero bytes, this function loads the corresponding posting header segment. A call to IsisTrmReadPrevious must be preceded by a call to IsisTrmReadMap, IsisTrmReadNext or another IsisTrmReadPrevious.

member.name: M:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisInterop.IsisTrmShelfSize(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Changes the size of an inverted file shelf.
member.param: Identifies the ISIS Space.
Specifies the term shelf number.
Specifies the number of bytes to be allocated.

summary.para: Each master file has a record with MFN 0 called Master File Control Record. It is always stored at the beginning of the file. It has a fixed length and it has no corresponding cross-reference record.
The control record has the following fixed data fields.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordControl.Nxtmfn
member.summary: Next master file number to be assigned.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordControl.Nxtmfb
member.summary: Address of the next master file record; 512 bytes block number.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordControl.Nxtmfp
member.summary: Address of the next master file record: offset within the block.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordControl.mfcxx2
member.summary: Zero or number of applications with data entry lock.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordControl.mfcxx3
member.summary: Zero or 1 for exclusive write lock granted to one application.

member.name: T:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisRecordStatus
member.summary: Record status as reported by ISIS32.DLL.

member.name: T:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisSearchHeader
member.summary: The function IsisSrcSearch executes a search expression over an ISIS Space Inverted file, stores the result in the search log file and moves basic resulting data of the expression executed into an application area called search header structure. A search header structure has the following data.

member.name: T:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisSearchHit
member.summary: Search hits, as well as term postings, have the following structure.

member.name: T:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTermPosting
member.summary: Each posting has a data structure that identifies the source of the term occurence in the database. A posting structure has 20 bytes.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTermPosting.Mfn
member.summary: Master file record mfn that originated the term occurence.

member.name: F:ManagedIrbis.Isis.IsisTermPosting.Id
member.summary: Field identifier, as defined in the fst table.

member.name: T:ManagedIrbis.Isis.Properties.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ManagedIrbis.Isis.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ManagedIrbis.Isis.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.
